title: Covid-19 spreads in US.
text: Multiple outbreaks worldwide have led to countries stepping up their responses. By Debora MacKenzie and Press Association.
abstract: Multiple outbreaks worldwide have led to countries stepping up their responses. By Debora MacKenzie and Press Association.

similar.title: Is it super-spreading?
text: If the covid-19 virus is transmitted largely by superspreaders, it might not go pandemic, reports Debora MacKenzie.
abstract: If the covid-19 virus is transmitted largely by superspreaders, it might not go pandemic, reports Debora MacKenzie.

similar.title: What happens next?
text: The novel coronavirus that emerged in Wuhan has exploded worldwide. What happens if it goes pandemic? Debora MacKenzie reports.
abstract: The novel coronavirus that emerged in Wuhan has exploded worldwide. What happens if it goes pandemic? Debora MacKenzie reports.

similar.title: Covid-19 goes global.
text: Our chance to limit international outbreaks may be over as the virus spreads in Italy and the Middle East, reports Debora MacKenzie.
abstract: Our chance to limit international outbreaks may be over as the virus spreads in Italy and the Middle East, reports Debora MacKenzie.

similar.title: Why the WHO won't use the p-word.
text: Why the WHO won't use the p-word.
There are no criteria for a pandemic, but covid-19 looks like one, says Debora MacKenzie.
abstract: There are no criteria for a pandemic, but covid-19 looks like one, says Debora MacKenzie.

similar.title: How well prepared are we?
text: Covid-19 is rapidly spreading around the world during a period when many healthcare systems are already under pressure, reports Debora MacKenzie.
abstract: Covid-19 is rapidly spreading around the world during a period when many healthcare systems are already under pressure, reports Debora MacKenzie.
